definitions.title: vb. Hithpa.
definitions.body: volunteer, offer freely (Targum BH [[נׇדַב]]);—Pf. 3 mpl. [[הִתְנַדַּ֫בוּ]] Ezr 7:15; Inf. [[הִתְנַדָּבוּת]] v:Ezr 7:16; Pt. v:Ezr 7:13; pl. [[מִתְנַדַּב]] v:Ezr 7:13; pl. [[דְּבִין]]- v:Ezr 7:16;—
give, or offer freely, v:Ezr 7:15, acc. rei + [[ל]] of God; v:Ezr 7:16, c. [[ל]] of temple; freewill gift (inf., prop. freewill giving) v:Ezr 7:16.
